Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: அழிவி னவைநீக்கி ஆறுய்த்து அழிவின்கண் அல்லல் உழப்பதாம் நட்பு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: (True) friendship turns aside from evil (ways) makes (him) walk in the (good) way, and, in case of loss if shares his sorrow (with him).

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A powerful triptych illustrating the three duties of friendship.
Layered_Composition.Midground: In the left panel, a true friend is shown steering their companion away from a destructive, ruinous path ('அழிவினவை நீக்கி'). In the central panel, the friend is guiding their companion onto the correct, virtuous path ('ஆறுய்த்து'). In the right panel, the companion has suffered a great loss or ruin ('அழிவின்கண்'), and the true friend is shown sitting with them in their sorrow, sharing their burden and weeping with them ('அல்லல் உழப்பது').
Layered_Composition.Background: The three panels show a complete story of guidance, correction, and support, defining the multifaceted nature of true friendship.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: True friendship has three jobs: to prevent ruin, to guide towards good, and to share in the sorrow of ruin.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The three distinct actions in the three panels clearly define the roles of a true friend. The shared sorrow in the final panel is particularly important.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The ruinous path is dark. The virtuous path is bright. The scene of shared sorrow is somber but lit with the warm glow of companionship.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide shot that frames the three narrative panels together.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with a strong, emotional storytelling quality.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Three distinct lighting schemes to match the mood of each panel.
